mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, provider, nickname, profile_image) VALUES(#{request.email}, #{request.provider}, #{request.nickname}, #{request.profileImage})
mapper.select: SELECT m.nickname, m.profile_image AS profileImage, m.age_range AS ageRange, m.gender, NVL(SUM(gp.AMOUNT), 0) AS greenPoint FROM member m LEFT JOIN green_point gp ON m.ID = gp.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.id = #{id} GROUP BY m.nickname, m.profile_image, m.age_range, m.gender
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET age_range = #{request.ageRange}, gender = #{request.gender}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{request.id}
UPDATE member SET is_signup_completed = 'Y' WHERE id = #{id}
